accessibility.text: Three Types of Unemployment
Structural unemployment: workers do not have skills currently in demand

Librarian, travel agent, VCR repairman, all those whose skills can be replaced by AI and robots.

Three Types of Unemployment
Structural unemployment: workers do not have skills currently in demand
Librarian, travel agent, VCR repairman, all those whose skills can be replaced by AI and robots.
Frictional unemployment: workers who have the necessary skills
Recently graduated, workers who want to relocate
Cyclical unemployment: workers who have the necessary skills, but lack of demand prevents firms from hiring them back
